answers.answer: Also, when she was born the doctors thought she had diabetes but when they gave her insulin she got really sick so that ruled out diabetes.

question: This is such a rare case that I'm not even sure what forum to ask the question in. My girlfriend was born with a very rare disease, the doctors never found out what it was. She can only eat protein, that's it I kid you not. Basically all she eats is meat because if she eats anything else she gets sick so anything that turns to sugar she can't eat. She'll be turning 22 in a couple weeks. I thought I'd ask around to see if anyone knows anything about it.
title: RARE symptoms, only know one person who has them
